Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Sports
Status: New Series
Network: TSN ( Canada)
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: February 04, 2013

24CH brings fans inside the storied NHL team – both at home and on the road – as the Canadiens organization opens up its locker room to the public for the first time in franchise history.
